divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the US Airways 207 that Departed Nashville Metropolitan, TN at 6:00pm. At 6:30 pm I looked out the window and notice a large flat object slowly coming from the front of the airplane to the back of the plane. I was seated in a window seat on the left side of the plane. The passenger seated diretly in front of me also saw the object. It was large and very flat with no sign of a cockpit. The object was either rectangular or traiangle shape. When we arrived in Charlotte Douglas, NC around 8:11pm, I asked the pilot, what was that plane that pass our plane around 6:30pm. The pilot said, what plane? He said I'm sure the tower was tracking it. The conversation was very strange. Flight information: Economy | Boeing 737-300 Passenger (733) | 1hr 11min | 329 miles
Summary: Large object two planes length away from my airplane and flew slowly pass the front of the plane to the back of the plane until I could not see it anymore.
trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were no other sightings in Nashville on or around June 15th 2005
